comments: I have a .xsd that uses xs:include to include other .xsd files. The types defined in the included files don't seem to be recognized. If I place the cursor on one of the unrecognized types and press F3 to navigate to the type definition, I get the error. Reason: NullPointerException
BTW, the unrecognized xs:include uses a relative path.
